thread.title_full: Austrian Airlines: Rental car offerings for almost all Austrian destinationsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Austrian Airlines: Rental car offerings for almost all Austrian destinationsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Austrian Airlines: Rental car offerings for almost all Austrian destinations Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
Austrian Airlines is expanding its rental car offering, and is launching a partnership with CarTrawler, the world’s largest online booking platform for rental cars. In this way passengers can compare the offers of numerous rental car companies at www.austrian.com or directly at http://cars.cartrawler.com/austrian/en/ effective immediately and use the platform for booking the vehicles. In addition, all rental car bookings can be changed or cancelled up to 24 hours before collecting the vehicle at no charge.
“Our customers can quickly and conveniently book suitable rental cars, from compact cars to luxury limousines, for almost all Austrian Airlines destinations thanks to our cooperation with CarTrawler”, says Alexander Leinhart, responsible for partner management of Austrian Airlines’ e-commerce business.
Michael Cunningham, Chief Commercial Officer of CarTrawler, adds: “Ancillary revenue is an increasingly important driver of commercial success, and a major contributor to the bottom line of airlines across the globe, and we’re delighted that Austrian Airlines is partnering with CarTrawler to make the most of that opportunity”.
